/* Example of external function definition */

// "atrament" object is available in the external function as "this",
// if it is not an arrow function
function myExampleFunction(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name} (Atrament ${this.version})`;
}

/*
  default export should be an object with the following keys:
  "name": function name
  "external": function definition,
  "lookaheadSafe" (optional, false by default): see https://github.com/inkle/ink/blob/master/Documentation/RunningYourInk.md#actions--vs-pure-functions
*/
export default {
  name: "example",
  external: myExampleFunction
}
